title: Chapter 150 - The Queen's Forceful Pairing
body:
Chapter 150 - The Queen's Forceful Pairing


“I really… really like you.” The queen pecked Yao Si several times, pulling her into a tight embrace. With a height advantage, she pressed Yao Si deeply into her bosom.


Before Yao Si could react, her body weakened. She couldn’t breathe…


Save… me!


At the crucial moment, her dependable nanny dad came forward to forcefully tear her away from the queen, allowing air to enter her lungs once more. Yao Si took in a long deep breath; women with big bosom were sure freaky.


“What are you doing?” The queen flew into a rage, glaring at Mu Xuan. “Why did you separate me from dearest?!”


“…” Who is your dearest? It hasn’t been five minutes since we met!


Mu Xuan’s face sank, his brows deeply furrowed as he spat, “She is mine!” She was HIS cub.


The queen froze, her expression as though she had just received devastating news. Her entire body swayed as she trembled, and even her wings paled. She seemed in great agony as her eyes reddened with unshed tears. Her pitiful, shattered expression was quite sympathetic…


After half a minute, she turned an accusatory glare at Yao Si. “Dearest, you… you… I love you so much, how could you… how could you…” Before she could even finish her sentence, huge droplets started to stream down her face.


“You… don’t cry!” Yao Si was instantly engulfed with guilt. She instinctively inched forward, prepared to comfort her.


“Sisi!” Mu Xuan tightened his grip around her, pulling her back.


Yao Si took a moment to regain her senses.


Wait a minute!


Why was she even guilty? She barely knew that woman! As expected, those with good looks always got the easy way out.


“Your Majesty, you must have mistaken me for someone else?” Yao Si inhaled, struggling to disregard her devastated look before adding calmly, “I don’t even know you.”


“I’m called Lian Yu!” the queen said hurriedly.


Er… I’m sure this isn’t just about a name?


“You’re called Sisi, right?” She inched closer, love and admiration apparent in her gaze. “Lian Yu… Sisi, doesn’t it sound like a couple!”


“…” How does it sound like a couple! Stop forcing such a pairing!


“Dearest, why don’t you return to the feather folk with me? Don’t be swayed by the stray flowers out there, I’m your true love.”


“…” Stray flower Mu Xuan.


Yao Si’s lips twitched, and she said slowly, emphasizing each syllable, “I am a woman!”


“I don’t mind!” Lian Yu continued to gaze at her without blinking.


But I mind!


F*ck! What is going on, how did the queen fall for me?!


“From the moment I set my eyes on you, I was sure that you are the one I’ll spend the rest of my life with. Sisi, come home with me!” the queen confessed bashfully.


Wait a minute!


“Didn’t you capture me for my ability just now?”


“That was awhile back, I don’t need it anymore!”


“What do you mean?” How could you be so fickle!


“Previously… I sought you out for your ability. Since I’m the last feather royal of the feather folk, I’m afraid that there will no longer be any pure blooded royals in our family. I heard that you have the ability to impregnate someone so I…”


She raised her palms to shield her embarrassment, her face blazing a fiery shade of red. “But I never expected… you to be so amazing! So I decided… I don’t need any pure blooded royals. Sisi, let’s get married! Let me… bear you kids!”


“…” Shouldn’t a queen be resolute and responsible? How could you be so fickle and reckless! Are your people even aware of what you’re thinking?!


“Enough!” Mu Xuan was grim. He glared at the queen coldly as though he was at his last straw. “Get lost.”


With a wave of his hand, a flash of light flew over. The queen stumbled backward while Mu Xuan held onto Yao Si, and the next moment they were back on the aircraft.


“You guys are back!” Lu Chen exclaimed, bolting upwards.


Suddenly, the aircraft shook. Above them, the gigantic lotus aircraft had split into two and was floating toward them.


It… split apart?


Er, nanny dad.. is that angry?


“This… What happened?” Lu Chen looked on in disbelief. “The flower of the heavenly tree, how…” Isn’t it the most advanced aircraft in the Galaxy?


“My aircraft!” Lu Chen was still in a daze when a screen suddenly popped up. The queen’s enraged expression filled the screen, and she glanced around before focusing on Mu Xuan. “You despicable bastard, you dare destroy my aircraft! Return Sisi back to me now!” she screamed before sending a tender and pitiful look to Yao Si. “Sisi, are you really going to leave me? I entrusted you with my heart, so how could you believe him? All men are bad!”


“…” I didn’t abandon you!


“Start the aircraft!” Mu Xuan disregarded the woman entirely, directing a chilling glare at Lu Chen.


“Ah? Ah! Alright!” Lu Chen trembled from his intense gaze and started the aircraft almost instinctively. He had no idea how the situation had become like that.


“Stop! Where are you bringing my Sisi?” the queen screamed frantically. “You can’t leave! Did you hear me?”


“Enter the galactic portal, we’re heading to the next realm,” Mu Xuan instructed.


“Ah?!” Lu Chen stilled. Didn’t they want to explore the main planets of the various races? Why were they leaving so abruptly? However, he kept silent after catching sight of Mu Xuan’s intimidating aura. It seemed as though any resistance would send him to his grave!


“You..” The queen started to panic at Mu Xuan’s disregard, and she turned toward Lu Chen. “Does the Yao really want to go against my people?”


“This… this…” Lu Chen trembled and accidentally hit a wrong button. How did it escalate into a race issue? He wasn’t ready to bear such consequences!


Sensing him wavering, Lian Yu added, “Open the portal for your aircraft now and I won’t pursue the destruction of my aircraft…”


Before she could even finish her sentence, Mu Xuan lifted his hand. Once again, a ray of light flashed, and the aircrat that had split into two was dissected into countless tiny pieces, it’s original appearance no longer visible.


Mu Xuan’s expression darkened. “We’re the Yao, but bloodlings!” You can declare war if you dare!


Without waiting for her reaction, he tapped on the screen. With another flash of light, the aircraft entered the portal. Far in the distance, a faint infuriated cry could be heard.


Half a minute later, Lu Chen spoke up. “Boss, can I use a month’s salary to ask what happened just now?”


“… I’ll give you three months of your salary to shut you up!”


“…”


Employee has a grievance, but employee dare not complain!
